snippet: The head of the federal domestic intelligence service indicated that the likely target was a Berlin airport and that the suspect had ties to ISIS....
abstract: German authorities arrest Syrian refugee Jaber al-Bakr, recovering three pounds of explosives from his home in Chemnitz and averting possible terror attack; indicate Bakr has ties to Islamic State and that his target was probably Berlin airport.
lead_paragraph: The head of the federal domestic intelligence service indicated that the likely target was a Berlin airport and that the suspect had ties to ISIS.

headline.main: Refugee’s Capture in Germany Is Said to Thwart Terrorist Attack
headline.print_headline: Attack Foiled by Capture of Refugee, Germans Say

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
